gen:link.msg:message: `ReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisions` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReinsurancePartTechnicalProvisionsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
